alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Salt Lake... Davis...northwestern Utah and northeastern Tooele Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 115 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Syracuse to 12 miles south of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to near Tooele Army Depot. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Layton, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Grantsville, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Stansbury Park, South Weber, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport and Tooele Army Depot. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 311 and 334. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 77 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
